text: Wolfango Montanari (16 May 1931 – 23 February 2021) was an Italian sprinter. He was born in Terni, Italy. He won five medals at the International athletics competitions. He competed in the 1952 Summer Olympics, he has 14 caps in national team from 1951 to 1957. Montanari died on 23 February 2021 in Terni, aged 89.OL-helten Tormod Knutsen er død ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympians for Italy Category:Italian sprinters Category:Sportspeople from Umbria
title: Wolfango Montanari
